title: UAE confers highest military award on naval chief
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 05 (APP): Chief of the Naval Staff Admiral Muhammad Amjad Khan Niazi Thursday conferred with the highest military medal of the United Arab Emirates (UAE) during an impressive award ceremony, held at the UAE embassy.
The medal was conferred on the naval chief by the UAE Deputy Supreme Commander Armed Forces Sheikh Mohammed bin Zayed Al Nahyan in recognition of his outstanding professional services and efforts to enhance bilateral relations and cooperation between the two brotherly countries, said a Pakistan Navy news release.
Admiral Muhammad Amjad Khan Niazi was the first naval chief to receive this Medal.
